text: O you who believe ! If anyone among you turns back from his religion (Islam), then God will bring a people whom He will love and they will love Him, humble towards the believers, mighty over the disbelievers, striving in the way of God and not fearing the blame of anyone who blames. That is the grace of God, He gives it to whom He wills, and God is Omnipresent (Ample giving), Knowing
